user_description: Follow the notes upon the journey. At first sight marks one's destiny.
Even the most impossible dream comes true.
Hey Mr. Curiosity, is it true what they've been saying about you? Are you killing me?
You take the good, you take the bad,you take them both and there you have the facts of life.
